title: What is this beast.
content:
It's on the cover of The Phaidon Atlas of 21st Century World Architecture.

Is it custom? I feel like I have seen this before, I may even have it buried deep on my computer.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106230633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_4729.jpg)
author: KeenanC

comments.content: not an exact match, I guess I was a little hasty...

Could be custom, designed for a modular signage system (segmented LED display or the like).  
—Noam
